byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: LONDON, July 31--Prime Minister Winston Churchill visited the coastal defenses of Northeast England today. He was accompanied by high staff officers and was cheered wherever he went....

headline.main: CHURCHILL INSPECTS DEFENSES ON COAST; Says Hitler Will Have Bad Journey if He Has Caught the Bus

lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 31--Prime Minister Winston Churchill visited the coastal defenses of Northeast England today. He was accompanied by high staff officers and was cheered wherever he went.
